reviewText: I got them soon as I ordered it and I love getting more that one dvd and I like Tommy Lee Jones.
Great Actor and any and all his movies are great Ty Cobb is fantastic a must see. Would advise everyone to buy this
He is my favorite actor in the world.  Add like 45-50 years onto me and I would marry him haha.  Cobb was really dumb, but the rest were great.  Loved them, but I am bias :)
havent watched them all yet but was a good deal for 4 movies. quality is good no complaints from me.
The top dvd looks ok, the second(the client) has a mark on it which I hope does not effect the play of the dvd.  After I watch these shows, I will update my review.  Disappointed
This is a great set of movies at an awesome price! I would definitely recommend this to anyone intersted in buying this item!
every one of these films-perfect! you will enjoy the quality and the colors and TLJ is his best-yes he is!
Cobb was filled with profane language.  Opted to just shut it off.  Otherwise, the rest of the movies were quite good.

I bought this set specifically for COBB. I believe it's out of print, but available by itself on eBay for $40+ if you want it badly enough. All four movies are great and a wonderful addition to any fan's library.

The movies are not blu-ray,  but they played just fine as regular dvd.

I always wanted to see Ty Cobb movie didn't want to pay much for it. The movie was very poor.

US Marshall and Space Cowboys good movies.

Haven't watched Client yet.
Just what I wanted and it arrived on-time!
Great buy
My mom loves Morgan Freeman movies. So it was perfect for her.
Good bundle for the price

Tommy Lee Jones is one of my favorite actors and these films show why. U.S. Marshalls" is non-stop action with great performances by all. Cobb" is impressive although the veracity of the biography it is based on has been questioned.
I love it
The US Marshall was the most depressing movie I viewed in a long time.
Enjoyed all 4 movies. Perfect condition. Very good seller.
not really happy with how this was packaged, but movies were great and price was great.  wouldn't buy dvds this way again
Did not really like Cobb. Other movies were excellent.
Enjoyed every film in this collection
It's a gift
Happy to get 4 great movies on DVD.  Love them all
works great!
Oh what a treat!!!! If you're a Tommy Lee fan, this collection is a treasure that should be added to your library.
This DVD had to movies that I was very much interested in. The other two will be good filler for late nights when there's nothing else to do.
This item was a gift and it brought several hours of viewing pleasure to the recipient.
This is the best made that I have found for the price it was. Amazon handles their product well.  SW
I had been looking for COBB for years and I love Tommy Lee Jones.  This was a great purchase.
4 good ones.
bro in law was happy
All we're great but, Cobb was the best.
Very good
I like Tommy Lee Jones
Very happy
Great old Movies...
Great deal for the money. You receive 4 individual dvd's for the price of one.  All excellent movies!
OK THANKS
Four excellent movies at a very good price
Good  with the exception of the Ty Cobb film which was pretty dismal--but then so was Cobb when he was off the field.
Good

The Ty Cobb movie was horrible. Too vulgar but I suppose that appeals to certain people, the rawness of it. I have to wonder if Ty Cobb was really that bad as he is portrayed. But Tommie Lee Jones's earlier days of cinema were indeed very raw and vulgar. He has softened with age and now is easier to watch. Space Cowboys being my favorite. The other two movies fall somewhere in between.
This is a great collection of Tommy Lee Jones's best movies. The picture and sound of these dvd's are crisp and clear. I'd highly recommend this 4 pack for all of his fans.
Some of my husbands favorite movies and a couple of mine as well.  I bought this for him for Christmas and what a deal 4 movies for the price of one.
This dvd arrived in a timely fashion.  I have seen all four movies and they were all in good shape.  I really like these DVDs!
I found a the classic films great but I did not like Cobb. I was still a great buy will get a lot of enjoyment out of it .
Bought this for a huge Tommy Lee Jones fan and he absolutely loved this! All four of the movies are very entertaining as well.

I chose this rating because you cannot find the movie Cobb hardly anywhere and was in fact my favorite Tommy Lee Jones movie. On top of that, you get three other movies of his for the price of one movie. Well worth the price!
Tommy's the best
Good value I would buy again
Good movies.

I bought this mainly for Ty Cobb and was pleasantly surprised with The Client which was a great movie. I already had US Marshall's and Space Cowboys and gave them to a friend. Even though I gave two movies away, this was well worth the money.
love it
Love each one of these actor's! Always know whatever their doing,it's going to be good!
Good
Loved the 4 in 1 film festival.  I now know what it is to couch binge on a rainy day.  Everything I wanted in Tommy Lee Jones.
Great movies!
Two of the 4 discs are not labeled telling what the movies are.
